lead_paragraph: LOEFFLER--Herman "Sonny". The RiverSpring Health and Hebrew Home at Riverdale families mourn the loss of Sonny Loeffler, its treasured friend and member of its Board of Directors. Sonny was a deeply devoted family man who brought sunshine to his family, friends and all who were fortunate to know him. His commitment and leadership to the quality of life of older adults has impacted and improved the lives of countless New Yorkers. We extend our heartfelt condolences to the entire Loeffler family. May they be comforted among the mourners of Zion. RiverSpring Health Jeffrey S. Maurer, Chairman Daniel Reingold, President & CEO 1/3
